title: dinam IdE
sahitya:
dinam IdE naTrinamE shivaparanai bhajanai sheyyum


anupallavi

  ghana mOha iruL shUzhum bhavasAgarattait-tANDik-
karai sErvikkum haran aruLaip-pugazhndu pADum


caraNam    paghalum iravum vayiTrirai tEDavum kAma pashi tIrkkavum tirindu
 iLaittOm pArinil arpa sukhattil kaLittum perum tuyariTriLaittum
 haranait-tozhavum maandu pAzhukkiraittu enna pEru petrOm
